properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:16AM EST until February 7 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service Rah has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...

N. Fk. Holston River Near Saltville affecting Smyth County

Two to three inches of rain has resulted in excessive runoff
across portions of the North Fork Holston river. The river is
expected to crest above 10 feet near Saltville, with the possibly
of a higher crest if additional rainfall exceeds expectations.

The National Weather Service in Rah has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the N. Fk. Holston River Near Saltville
* from this afternoon until Friday morning
* At 09AM Thursday the stage was 6.8 feet.
* Flood Stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.

* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 10.5 feet by this evening.The river will
fall below flood stage by tonight.
* Impact...at 10.0 feet...Minor flooding of lowlands along the
river.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 9.5 feet
on Apr 24 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
